# qwalkr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of the R package qwalkr is to provide functions and methods to create, visualize and investigate properties of continuous-time Quantum Walks under the state vector representation of Quantum Information.

## Installation

You can install the development version of qwalkr like so:


```{r, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("vitormarquesr/qwalkr")
```
